# **Health Innovation Lab**

## ðŸ”µ **Who we are**

We are a multidisciplinary team focused on **designing and evaluating
innovative and accessible technologies to improve peopleâ€™s health**. We
promote the **use of technologies and open data** in order to lower
implementation barriers, reproducibility and increase the impact of
innovation proposals.

Our main lines of research include the development of diagnostic and
detection systems, development of tools for environmental parameter
detection, data science and big data applied to tropical diseases, and
geospatial analysis of mobility and migration patterns.

## ðŸ”µ **Package installation**

You can install the first version of innovar from
[GitHub](https://github.com/):

The following code just copy and paste into the R console:

    if(!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
    remotes::install_github("healthinnovation/innovar@v.0.1.2")

    library(innovar)

# Package index

## Census data

- [`get_od_data()`](get_od_data.md) : Get census-like data in a
  origin-destination format

## Graphics

- [`show_pal()`](show_pal.md) : Show a set of palette color Lab
- [`scale_color_innova()`](scale_color_innova.md) : Color scale
  constructor for lis colors
- [`scale_fill_innova()`](scale_fill_innova.md) : Fill scale constructor
  for lis colors
- [`innova_pal()`](innova_pal.md) : Return function to interpolate a lis
  color palette

## Administrative limit

- [`gen_admin_div()`](gen_admin_div.md) : Create categories for
  adiministrative divisions (Peru)

## Vulnerability

- [`vulnerability_index()`](vulnerability_index.md) : Vulnerability
  Index

## Utils

- [`allpautils_names()`](allpautils_names.md) : Remove accents and
  hyphens in character vector
- [`read_batch()`](read_batch.md) : Utility for dataset batch importing
  in multiple formats
- [`export()`](export.md) : Export CSV file to MongoDB
- [`create_dap()`](create_dap.md) : Create a Data Analysis Project
- [`use_xaringan()`](use_xaringan.md) : Use Innovar Xaringan Template
- [`use_rmd_flatly()`](use_rmd_flatly.md) : Use Innovar Rmarkdown Flatly

## Dataset

- [`Peru`](Peru.md) : Peru names and spatial
- [`migration17raw`](migration17raw.md) : Raw migration data from the
  Peru census of 2017
